## GerstnerWaveGenerator.setOmniWave() method

Sets whether the wave is an omni-directional wave.

**Signature:**

```typescript
setOmniWave(waveIndex: number, isOmni: boolean): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  waveIndex | number | index of the wave to set. |
|  isOmni | boolean | true if the wave is an omni-directional wave, false otherwise. |

**Returns:**

void
